name: Dice And The Diced
description:
#📜Introduction:

Hello everyone, this is a great game built for couples💑 and friends👬, and it requires at least two players to begin.

#🎮Game Rules:

Both players take alternate turns to roll the dice🎲, gradually reveal a picture🖼, and make a guess about the picture🖼's content. 

a play walkthrough:

player 1 starts by rolling the dice🎲. 

The number on the dice🎲(n) represents the number of tiles he/she can reveal. player 1 then select n tiles to reveal (tile has to be adjacent to each other)

Then, player1 can try to guess the content of the picture

if it's correct, the game reveals the whole picture and proceeds to the next level

if it's wrong, player1 ends his/her turn and player 2 repeats the above process

SP: Both players have 4 SP(Skill Points) throughout the game that is not refillable. Players can spend those points on three different special actions:

double dice: roll two dices instead of one for this turn

random select: player can select non-adjacent tiles for this turn

tilt image: player can tilt the hidden image and view it from a different perspective.

After 10 levels, the one with greater score will be the King of knowledge!

#🍀|Lucky Notes:

I hope this game will bring laughter and happiness and I hope everyone will enjoy it! Don't forget to share it with your friends if you like it!
